title: Interview with Drew Dalton
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Drew Dalton, a senior lecturer from the University of Sunderland about issues surrounding sexuality. Drew outlines the research and work he does with LGBT+ individuals including his work looking at LGBT Muslims in the UK.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Matthew talks to Drew Dalton, a senior lecturer from the University of Sunderland about issues surrounding sexuality. Drew outlines the research and work he does with LGBT+ individuals including his work looking at LGBT Muslims in the UK.
